name: Beryllium bromide
desc: Beryllium bromide is the chemical compound with the formula BeBr2. It is very hygroscopic and dissolves well in water. The compound is a polymer with tetrahedral Be centres.
Solubility:
soluble in ethanol, diethyl ether, pyridine
insoluble in benzene
PEL (Permissible):
TWA 0.002 mg/m3
C 0.005 mg/m3 (30 minutes), with a maximum peak of 0.025 mg/m3 (as Be)[2]
Other anions:
Beryllium fluoride
Beryllium chloride
Beryllium iodide
Other cations:
Magnesium bromide
Calcium bromide
Strontium bromide
Barium bromide
Radium bromide
